Summary: it seemed to be a large firework at first. then realized it was coming down not up.with the naked eye thru the windshield. it was an extremely large shooting star. with very vibrant colors and a very wide trail.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother and I were on our way home. Talking about random nonsense. We both looked up at the same time and said nothing until the green yellow and very bright white light shot across the sky at a downward trajectory. when the light stopped we both commented that we were waiting for the impact or some sign of a flash from whatever we saw hitting the ground.It looked as if it was the largest or closest shooting star ever except for the vibrant colors and the extremely large size of the trail.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Fenton
There were no other sightings in Fenton on or around September 28th 2013
